parent.description: Required. The name of the release resource, which is the parent of the test Format: `projects/{project_number}/apps/{app_id}/releases/{release_id}`

releaseTestId.description: Optional. The ID to use for the test, which will become the final component of the tests's resource name. This value should be 4-63 characters, and valid characters are /a-z-/. If it is not provided one will be automatically generated.

fields.description: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

key.description: API key. Your API key identifies your project and provides you with API access, quota, and reports. Required unless you provide an OAuth 2.0 token.

oauth_token.description: OAuth 2.0 token for the current user.

prettyPrint.description: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

quotaUser.description: Available to use for quota purposes for server-side applications. Can be any arbitrary string assigned to a user, but should not exceed 40 characters.

GoogleFirebaseAppdistroV1alphaReleaseTes.description: The results of running an automated test on a release.

createTime.description: Output only. Timestamp when the test was run.

deviceExecutions.description: Required. The results of the test on each device.

name.description: The name of the release test resource. Format: `projects/{project_number}/apps/{app_id}/releases/{release_id}/tests/{test_id}`

GoogleFirebaseAppdistroV1alphaDeviceExec.description: The results of running an automated test on a particular device.

crawlGraphUri.description: Output only. A URI to an image of the Robo crawl graph.

failedReason.description: Output only. The reason why the test failed.

inconclusiveReason.description: Output only. The reason why the test was inconclusive.

resultsStoragePath.description: Output only. The path to a directory in Cloud Storage that will eventually contain the results for this execution. For example, gs://bucket/Nexus5-18-en-portrait.

screenshotUris.description: Output only. A list of screenshot image URIs taken from the Robo crawl. The file names are numbered by the order in which they were taken.

state.description: Output only. The state of the test.

videoUri.description: Output only. A URI to a video of the test run.

GoogleFirebaseAppdistroV1alphaAppCrash.description: An app crash that occurred during an automated test.

message.description: Output only. The message associated with the crash.

stackTrace.description: Output only. The raw stack trace.

GoogleFirebaseAppdistroV1alphaTestDevice.description: A device on which automated tests can be run.

locale.description: Optional. The locale of the device (e.g. "en_US" for US English) during the test.

orientation.description: Optional. The orientation of the device during the test.

version.description: Required. The version of the device (API level on Android).

GoogleFirebaseAppdistroV1alphaRoboStats.description: Statistics collected during a Robo test.

actionsPerformed.description: Output only. Number of actions that crawler performed.

distinctVisitedScreens.description: Output only. Number of distinct screens visited.

mainActivityCrawlTimedOut.description: Output only. Whether the main activity crawl timed out.

google.description: Optional. Are these credentials for Google?

GoogleFirebaseAppdistroV1alphaLoginCrede.description: Hints to the crawler for identifying input fields

passwordResourceName.description: Required. The Android resource name of the password UI element. For example, in Java: R.string.foo in xml: @string/foo Only the "foo" part is needed. Reference doc: https://developer.android.com/guide/topics/resources/accessing-resources.html

usernameResourceName.description: Required. The Android resource name of the username UI element. For example, in Java: R.string.foo in xml: @string/foo Only the "foo" part is needed. Reference doc: https://developer.android.com/guide/topics/resources/accessing-resources.html

$block: The results of running an automated test on a release.

$ul: **createTime**: Output only. Timestamp when the test was run.
**deviceExecutions**: Required. The results of the test on each device.
**fieldHints**: Hints to the crawler for identifying input fields

**passwordResourceName**: Required. The Android resource name of the password UI element. For example, in Java: R.string.foo in xml: @string/foo Only the "foo" part is needed. Reference doc: https://developer.android.com/guide/topics/resources/accessing-resources.html

**usernameResourceName**: Required. The Android resource name of the username UI element. For example, in Java: R.string.foo in xml: @string/foo Only the "foo" part is needed. Reference doc: https://developer.android.com/guide/topics/resources/accessing-resources.html
**google**: Optional. Are these credentials for Google?
**name**: The name of the release test resource. Format: `projects/{project_number}/apps/{app_id}/releases/{release_id}/tests/{test_id}`
